definitions.text: an interval during which a recurring sequence of events occurs
examples: the never-ending cycle of the seasons

definitions.text: a series of poems or songs on the same theme
a periodically repeated sequence of events
examples: a cycle of reprisal and retaliation

definitions.text: the unit of frequency; one hertz has a periodic interval of one second
a single complete execution of a periodically repeated phenomenon
examples: a year constitutes a cycle of the seasons

definitions.text: a wheeled vehicle that has two wheels and is moved by foot pedals
cause to go through a recurring sequence
examples: cycle the laundry in this washing program
